title: CasinoBankCoin
author: CasinoBankCoin
content: Hello crypto community, I am with Casino Bank Coin, a BEP-20 token that has launched, with exclusive use at TheCryptoCasino.comPlease check out our website, https://casinobankcoin.com, for more information. We have a 3% tax, with 1.5% of that tax as a reflection bonus in the form of CBC tokens. The other 1.5% tax will be distributed to the project in the form of the original coin. The owner and dev wallets will not receive the reflection bonus. The tax will not be a part of the pre-sale. This tax operates automatically, and is embedded within the code of CBC.To see the websites in our network, check here: https://casinobankcoin.com/websitesFeel free to ask us questions, or give comments.
